game.name: Magicraft
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Magicraft" is a Roguelike game that uses a variety of spells to match unimaginable spell effects, and the construction of ultra-high degrees of freedom cannot even be exhausted by developers.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Magicraft" is a Roguelike game that uses a variety of spells to match unimaginable spell effects, and the construction of ultra-high degrees of freedom cannot even be exhausted by developers.

reviewHighlights.text: Amazing game, noita wand crafting meets binding of isaac dungeon crawl.
Seemingly endless combinations. This game is all about modding spells and the "wands" that you use to cast them making each run a little different fro...
